item.title: About
item.description:
I currently work as a Machine Learning Engineer at ML cube, a Politecnico di Milano spin-off, where I’m involved in the development of the ML cube Platform, an MLOps platform that offers data and model monitoring, drift explainability and performance-safe retraining.

I hold a Master’s degree in Artificial Intelligence from Politecnico di Milano and a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science from Universit√† Politecnica delle Marche. During the second year of the Master, I had the opportunity to spend a semester at the IT University of Copenhagen as an Erasmus student, which was an incredibly enriching experience.
